b:if.b:template-skin: body#layout,body#layout div.section{font-family:Arial,sans-serif}body#layout .locked-widget .widget-content{background-color:#fff}body#layout .add_widget a{margin-left:0;font-size:14px;color:rgba(255,255,255,.6)!important}body#layout .widget-content{padding:12px}body#layout div.section{background:transparent;margin:0 0 15px 0;padding:0;border:0}body#layout div.layout-title{font-size:14px}body#layout:before{content:"MOVIEBOX TMDB - Master Oppa ughhh=)";position:absolute;top:20px;left:25px;border-radius:4px;z-index:1;padding:10px 20px;font-size:18px;color:#fff;background:linear-gradient(90deg,#FC466B 0%,#3F5EFB 100%)}body#layout #tmdb-api-config h4,body#layout #temabanua-trend h4{display:none}body#layout #temabanua-trend>div{margin-top:0!important}body#layout{position:relative;padding:87px 25px 0 25px;max-width:920px;margin:0 auto!important;background-image:linear-gradient(to top,#09203f 0%,#537895 100%)!important;border:1px solid #213243!important}body#layout .visibility .editlink{display:inline-block!important;width:40px!important;height:40px!important;background:url('https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/128/12108/12108525.png') no-repeat center center!important;background-size:20px 20px!important;border-radius:4px!important;text-indent:-9999px!important}body#layout .draggable-widget .widget-wrap2{background: rgba(255, 66, 117, 1) url(https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-yTAuT5aZ1EY/Wy1eEeo4SbI/AAAAAAAACGM/FxOTPwL-Ch0_lyZxLRzhv2EWHINOmCjWACK4BGAYYCw/s22/draggable.png) no-repeat 4px 50% !important;}body#layout #main-logo,body#layout #main-menu,body#layout #head-right{float:left}body#layout #main-logo,body#layout #main-menu,body#layout #head-right{width:32%}body#layout #main-logo,body#layout #main-menu{padding-right:2%}body#layout #menu-mobile{display:inline-block;width:100%}body#layout .main-footer{display:flex}body#layout #footer-widget{width:50%;margin-right:20px}body#layout #footer-right{width:50%}body#layout #copyright{width:49%;display:inline-block;float:left}body#layout #theme-button{display:inline-block;width:49%;float:right}body#layout .Blog:before,body#layout:after{padding:5px 10px;display:block;color:#fff;font-size:12px;background: linear-gradient(90deg, #FC466B 0%, #3F5EFB 100%);position:relative;margin:0 0 15px}body#layout .Blog:before{content:"Post Blog Area";margin-bottom:8px}body#layout:after{content:"Designed by Master Oppa: https://t.me/abeflixgroupchat";visibility:visible}body#layout #main-menu h4:after{content:" - Main Menu Link"}body#layout #main-logo h4:after{content:" - Logo"}body#layout #main-logo h4,body#layout #main-menu h4,body#layout #menu-mobile h4,body#layout .layout-widget-description{font-size:12px!important}body#layout .section h4{padding:8px 10px;display:block;font-size:12px;color:#fff;background-image: radial-gradient( circle farthest-corner at -2% -25%, rgba(255,66,117,1) 0%, rgba(170,117,229,1) 100.7% );border:1px solid #455668;font-weight:400;margin:0;opacity:.8;line-height:8px}

div.p: Please log in or sign up to add a comment.

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting:
About Us


Welcome to Movie Box, your go-to destination for curated movies, series, and premium entertainment content from around the world.

At Movie Box, we are passionate about storytelling in all its forms — whether it's the heart-fluttering romance of K-dramas, the thrilling plot twists of C-dramas, the rich animation of anime, or the cinematic excellence of Western films and series. We believe that entertainment should be accessible, enjoyable, and organized for all fans, no matter where they are.

Our platform was built with simplicity and speed in mind. We provide an ad-light, clean, and user-friendly interface that allows you to explore thousands of titles across multiple genres. You can easily find what you're looking for through categorized collections, regular episode updates, and direct video or download links — all in one seamless experience.

What sets us apart is our commitment to quality and community. We do not simply dump links or trailers — we curate, verify, and organize content so you can enjoy safe and trustworthy access without the noise. We also listen to our users. Your feedback helps shape the features and future of this platform.

Whether you’re binge-watching the latest drama, exploring classic hits, or looking for a new favorite, [Movie Box] is here to make your viewing experience smooth, fun, and worthwhile.

We’re constantly evolving — with new features, better recommendations, and faster link updates — so make sure to bookmark us and check in often.

Thank you for visiting and supporting Movie Box. If you have questions, feature suggestions, or partnership inquiries, feel free to reach out through our contact form or social media channels. We’re always happy to hear from our community!

Privacy Policy


Effective Date: August 8, 2025

At [Your Website Name], we value your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines the types of information we collect and how we use, store, and protect it.

1. Information We Collect

We may collect the following types of information:

  • Personal Information: such as your name or email address, only when voluntarily submitted (e.g., through a contact form or newsletter).
  • Non-Personal Information: including browser type, device information, IP address, and pages visited. This data helps us improve user experience.

2. Cookies

Our site may use cookies to:

  • Analyze traffic and user behavior
  • Enhance your browsing experience
  • Store preferences or session data

You can choose to disable cookies through your browser settings.

3. Third-Party Services

We may use third-party services like:

  • Google Analytics – for understanding visitor behavior
  • Ad networks (e.g., Google AdSense) – to serve relevant ads
  • Embedded content (e.g., videos from other platforms) – which may collect data through their own policies

Please review the privacy policies of these third-party services for more information.

4. Data Security

We implement reasonable measures to protect your information. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

5. Links to Other Sites

Our website may contain links to other websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of those sites.

6. Children’s Privacy

We do not knowingly collect personal data from children under the age of 13. If you believe such data has been collected, please contact us immediately.

7. Your Consent

By using our website, you consent to this Privacy Policy.

8. Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page with a new effective date.

9. Contact Us

If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

📧 abeflixoriginal@gmail.com
